articles.title: Adele, 33, explains she makes music for her peers - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Easy On Me singer, 33, has just released 30, her fourth studio album, in which she explores the pain of her divorce from Simon Konecki, 47
articles.content:
Adele has insisted her music is solely aimed at her peers rather than the younger generation, due to the 'depth' of her lyrics.
